name: project-planning
description: Generates comprehensive planning documentation for web application projects, structuring work into context-safe phases with built-in verification criteria. Creates IMPLEMENTATION_PHASES.md, DATABASE_SCHEMA.md, API_ENDPOINTS.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, and other planning docs based on project needs. Optimized for Cloudflare Workers + Vite + React stack. Use when starting new projects, adding major features, or restructuring existing work into manageable phases.
